WorkItem.Summary: (Bug) Focus changes during zoom level changes.

Comments.Message: yes, it zooms to the currentposition, what are you expecting?

Well it's clearly not intuitive. Because not everyone manually inputs the coordinates. They start somewhere, pan to another area and then zoom. I don't see why they should be reset back to their "current position" as you call it? As in, where they are hovering above (looking at) should be their current position, don't you agree? :)
